sentences.en: ...Kelley, a former lawyer and protege of Steven Bochco.
sentences.cn: ...曾是一名律师的凯利，史蒂文•博克寇的门徒。

sentences.en: As the protege of the most powerful man in the country, his success is guaranteed.
sentences.cn: 他有该国最有势力的人作靠山，准能成功。

sentences.en: As the protege of the most powerful man in the country, his success was guaranteed.
sentences.cn: 他有该国最有势力的人作靠山, 准能成功.

sentences.en: Here I met coach Han Lei and his new protege Gao Ao.
sentences.cn: 在这里,我遇到了教练韩磊(音译)和他的新学生高敖(音译).

sentences.en: Moreover, I was His Majesty's special protege.
sentences.cn: 不仅如此, 我是这位皇帝陛下的特别宠儿.

sentences.en: The guitarist and composer Baden Powell was his protege.
sentences.cn: 吉他手和作曲家巴登鲍威尔是他的门徒.

sentences.en: The next morning, Protege was given a chance to even up the sides.
sentences.cn: 明天早晨, 被担保人有机会去结算.

sentences.en: This suggests that Mr Putin expects his protege to honour whatever agreement they have reached.
sentences.cn: 这番话令人猜想,普京先生或许期待他的被保护人尊重他们曾经达成的某些协议.

trans.tran_en: The protege of an older and more experienced person is a young person who is helped and guided by them over a period of time
